portfolio.description: 2 tutorials a week, weekly problem sets that are graded, coursemology is used and level 35 must be hit. there is a mid term and finals
portfolio.review: very difficult, do not recommend taking. must take with friends to discuss problems and lectures.

portfolio.description: Tutorials once every 2 weeks. Has no mid terms, 1 project and finals
portfolio.reveiw: Easy module. For me, our tutorial prof goes thru the lecture matierls before going thru tutorial so there is actually no need to watch the lectures. Workload relatively light. Take with high workload mods to balacnce out.
